transArray.content: Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. There is a free parking lot and laundry room. It is very close to Chaoyang Joy City. You can find it inside. Very convenient for shopping and eating. I hope this hotel can become your first choice in Beijing and sincerely look forward to your visit again!
